1: Chanting of David. O Jehovah, who shall sojourn in thy tent? who shall dwell in thy holy mountain?
2: He going blameless, and working justice, and speaking truth in his heart.
3: Slandering not with his tongue, not doing evil to his neighbor, lifting up no reproach against his neighbor.
4: In his eyes a reprobate being despised; and those fearing Jehovah, he will honor. Swearing to the friend, and he will not change.
5: Not giving his silver for interest, and gave not presents against the innocent. He doing these things shall not be moved forever.
